series/updates.description: Get economic data series sorted by when observations were updated on the FREDÂ® server (attribute last_updated). Results are limited to series updated within the last two weeks.

realtime_start.description: The start of the real-time period.

realtime_end.description: The end of the real-time period.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return
limit.restrictions: Must be an integer between 1 and 1000

filter_value.description: Limit results by geographic type of economic data series; namely 'macro', 'regional', and 'all'.
filter_value.restrictions: 'macro' limits results to macroeconomic data series. In general, these are series for entire countries that are not subregions of the United States. 'regional' limits results to series for parts of the US; namely, series for US states, counties, and Metropolitan Statistical Areas (MSA). 'all' does not filter results.
